name: k8s_autopilot
description: Production-grade multi-agent system for Kubernetes automation. Handles end-to-end Helm chart generation (Planning -> Template -> Validation) and active Cluster Management (Install -> Upgrade -> Rollback) with strict Human-in-the-Loop safety gates.

extensions.description: Provides rich interactive UI components (cards, buttons, forms)

skills.name: Helm Chart Generator
skills.description: Designs and generates production-ready Helm charts from natural language requirements.
examples: Create a high-availability Helm chart for a Node.js app with Redis
Generate a chart for a python worker with cronjobs and secrets

skills.name: Cluster Operations Manager
skills.description: Manages active Helm releases (Install, Upgrade, Rollback) on Kubernetes clusters.
examples: Rollback the last deployment of payment-service
List all failed releases in prod namespace
